item.description:
Hold signs to show support for your favorite campaign issue "Show ID to Vote" or candidate of your choice! Baker signs especially welcome.
Got a Jim4AG sign? Karyn Polito? Mary Z? Bill Campbell? They will all work wonders!
How about that Tea Party sign about Government Spending? With these Spend & Taxocrats all those signs are perfect!
Still have Scott Brown sign in one piece? Bring that just to remind Obama of how much we appreciate his helping Deval Patrick the way he helped Martha.
Add a Show ID to Vote sign to each sign you have and help every candidate get an honest vote!
What: Rally outside the Hynes where President Barack Obama and musical guest James Taylor will be deceiving the anti-constitutionalist moonbats.
Where: John B. Hynes Veterans Memorial Convention Center
900 Boylston Street, Boston, Mass.
Doors open: 12:00 p.m.
Remember the fun holding signs the day the Pres came to Boston to save the Kennedy Seat for Martha Coakley and the Democrats?
Remember the press coverage and the momentum that provided Scott Brown?
Time to do it all over again!
item.name: Boston Rally-Standout For Your Issue/Candidate, & Against stumping Obama-Patrick
